title: CV
text:
I am currently looking to transition from working as a Civil Engineer to Data Science and Data Engineering.

Key Qualifications


Technologies
Here is a list of technologies I consider myself sufficiently proficient to apply these in projects. However, I believe that a developer should always be ready to pick up new skills and learn new technology.
Languages: Python, JavaScript
Databases: PostgreSQL
Frameworks: FastAPI
Other skills: Cloud computing, containers using Docker, source control with Git


Work Experience


Ramboll Norway


Aug 2017 - Nov 2022


Senior Consulting Civil and Environmental Engineer

Leading consulting projects for water engineering (pipelines, pumping stations, treatment plants, stormwater design, etc.)
Typically having the Discipline Lead role in projects
Tasks: Producing tender documents, reports, design review, project management, BIM/CAD design.
Example of IT project: Assisting in deploying prototype for project QA with Python web app (Flask framework)



Aqua Unique Norway


08.2015 - 07.2027


Project Manager

Task: Technical design in project, project management, contracts, supplier negotiations, marketing, strategy and recruitment.
Development of Excel spreadsheets for project budgets, pricing models, supplier comparison, technical design, etc.
Assisting with operation of IT infrastructure (website, email, file server, backup, wiki, CRM system, etc)



Asplan Viak


Aug 2014 - Sept 2015


Consulting Civil Engineer

Tasks: Water and wastewater treatment plant desig and BIM/CAD modelling. Material takeoff, P&ID, tender documents.



COWI


Summer 2012


Summer Intern

Design of water distribution systems, and CAD modelling.



Silicon Labs (formerly Energy Micro)


Summer 2009


Summer Intern

C programming for development kit for energy efficient microcontroller.



Education


MSc in Civil and Environmental Engineering
Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU) Average Grade: A


Trondheim, Norway June 2015



Specialization: Water and Wastewater Engineering
Additional courses in Computer Science and Finance.

Federal University of Santa Catarina


Florianópolis, Brazil
2014

South America

Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU) Grade (1st yr): A

2008 - 2009

Algorithmic Programming Competition for High School Students (C++ Programming) Participated in Baltic Informatics Olympiad (BOI) and International Olympiad in Informatics (IOI).
